_label: Leaf Excised from the Tarleton Hours:  Christ Carrying the Cross (Terce, Office of the Virgin)

identified_by.content: Leaf Excised from the Tarleton Hours:  Christ Carrying the Cross (Terce, Office of the Virgin)

referred_to_by.content: A married couple with initials "M" and "V" and surname initial "L" (in 1654); John Ireland, gifted to Clayton Tarleton (by 1784); Clayton Tarleton (1762-1797), Liverpool, England; John Walter Tarleton (1811-1880), London, England, by inheritance to his son, Alfred H. Tarleton (-1880); Alfred H. Tarleton (1862-1921), London, England, by inheritance to his wife Henrietta Charlotte Tarleton (1880-1921); Mrs. Henrietta Charlotte Tarleton (1864-1951), London, England (1921-1951); [Sale: Christie's, London, 3 July 1951, lot 50 to Maggs Brothers] (3 July 1951); [Maggs Brothers, London (where miniatures were removed and sold indivdidually)] (1951-); [Sale: Sotheby's, London, 21 June 1988, lot 17] (21 June 1988); [Bruce Ferrini, Akron, OH, sold to Jeanne Miles Blackburn]; Jeanne Miles Blackburn, Maitland, FL, gifted to the Cleveland Museum of Art (-2001); The Cleveland Museum of Art, Cleveland, OH (2001-)
